EmailTemplate.description: CLM-MC-CLMCMA-10390 Notify Legal team to Activate for Wet Ink Signature
EmailTemplate.name: Agreement Wet Ink Signature
EmailTemplate.subject: Signature required for {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Attached document requires your signature. Refer the Agreement details below : Agreement Name : {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Name} Agreement Number : {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Apttus__FF_Agreement_Number__c} Start Date : {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c} Requestor Name : {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Apttus__Requestor__c} Please sign, scan and email the Agreement Documents back to Requestor. Thank you IQVIA
